.i ma paunai se cinri le cabna be lenu ra co'a speni
Do you speak Lojban?: Who cares when she gets married?

Do you speak Lojban?: I wonder if I should tell Alice what I just did.

.i ma cmene do
Do you speak Lojban?: What is your name?

.i le bruna be mi mi te cmene zo ractu
Do you speak Lojban?: My brother calls me "Rabbit"

.i do cnino mi le ka kakne le ka limna

.i cumki fa le nu la .alis. ba jai lerci
Do you speak Lojban?: It's possible that Alice will be late.

.i ba ku mi cusku fi ra fe lu do mutce le ka xendo li'u

.i do pu cusku le se du'u do ba gasnu le katna be le nanba
Do you speak Lojban?: You said that you would cut the bread.

ki'e sai do

.i mi djica le nu mi cusku le xajmi vau le nu do cisma
Do you speak Lojban?: I want to tell something funny to make you smile.

.i mi djica tu'a le plise
Do you speak Lojban?: I want the apples.

.i mi djuno le du'u mi zasti vau fo le du'u mi pensi
Do you speak Lojban?: I know that I exist since I think.

Do you speak Lojban?: I translated {coi ui} to English from Lojban as "Yay, hello!"

Do you speak Lojban?: I created a story out of my real experience to amuse the child.

i le du'u lo'e gadri cu lidne lo'e sinxa be lo se bridi cu gerna la .lojban. lo'e su'o sumti
Do you speak Lojban?: That gadri precede selbri is the grammar of Lojban for some sumti.

i mi gleki le nu do jinga
Do you speak Lojban?: I am happy that you won.

i mi na jimpe tu'a do
Do you speak Lojban?: I don't understand you.

i mi na jimpe le du'u ma kau smuni le se cusku be do

i mi na kakne le nu sipna
Do you speak Lojban?: I can't sleep.

.i xu do klama fi la .nipon.
Do you speak Lojban?: Are you from Japan?

.i le dargu cu se kruca lu'a le pu ve klama be le ractu
Do you speak Lojban?: The road crossed what was the rabbit's track.

Do you speak Lojban?: We sailed on the boat along the lake from the home to an island.

i mi pu klama fi la .nipon. fu le ka se marce le vinji
Do you speak Lojban?: I flew from Japan.

Do you speak Lojban?: I'm a Lojbanic person in that I'm interested in Lojban; I don't speak it.

.i ti me le titla vanju
Do you speak Lojban?: This is an example of sweet wine.

.i ti mutce le ka kargu
Do you speak Lojban?: This is very expensive.

.i mi mutce le ka senpi
Do you speak Lojban?: I highly doubt that.

.i ra pu pilno le skami le nu facki le se nitcu
Do you speak Lojban?: He used a computer to get the necessary information.

.i le xo prenu ca zvati ti voi kumfa

i le skapi be ra pu simsa le snime le ka blabi

Do you speak Lojban?: I am free as a bird.

.i do .e'o ciska le srana be le se lifri be do
Do you speak Lojban?: Please write about your experience.

Do you speak Lojban?: Is your journey related to your job?

.i ko smaji ca le nu mi tavla la .alis. fo la .lojban. fi le nu prami
Do you speak Lojban?: Keep silence when I'm talking to Alice in Lojban about love.

.i mi mo'u tcidu le se ciska le bitmu

Do you speak Lojban?: "привет" is a Russian text.

i le mamta be mi ku po'o cu vlipa le nu mi cliva

i lu ki'e do li'u lu je'e do li'u
Do you speak Lojban?: "Thank you!" "You are welcome!"

i do pu mutce le ka sidju mi vau ki'e sai do
Do you speak Lojban?: You helped me a lot, thank you very much!

i lei rirni cu zvati ti ca

i mi dunda fe tu'a ti fi do

i ge do gi mi nelci le'e perli

Do you speak Lojban?: When you feel frustrated about being lonely, remember the happy moments we had together.
